website_summaries.verdict: Well-made, durable bottle that keeps sparkling wines fizzy and cool for long periods of time.
pros: Withstands dropping without dents or serious paint chipping
Keeps drinks cold for days at a time, especially with a little ice in the bottle
Also works well with beer and sparkling wine, keeps drinks fizzy
cons: Large bottle is heavy and hard to handle when full

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.  Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Yeti 64 and this. For whatever reason, the Yeti keeps my drinks colder than the SMG. I believe it's in the cap design, but I'm no engineer. Just an observation based on their designs. I do like the orange color, though. Able to put my daughter's name on it with a Sharpie without it rubbing off like it does on the stainless Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Bottle on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This has a great look to it and the stainless steel is perfect. Just be sure to wash it out thoroughly when you get it to avoid the metallic taste. I bought an Onoola carrier for it and although the carrier is made for another brand of growler, it fits the Smoky Mountain perfectly. I've only been using it for a few days, but I use it every day. It seems like it will hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Label/silk screening dissolved/came off after 3 washes.
customer_reviews.text: Just used this container 3 times, and the silk screening label is dissolving/steering. It comes off on anything it touches. Also was not impressed with the insulation vs. other comparable products. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: napanat

customer_reviews.title: Even sometimes the ice will stay pretty solid for a good 10-12 hrs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as he works from home and sometimes doesn't make time to get himself up to get water. He loves it, it keeps his water cold all day. Even sometimes the ice will stay pretty solid for a good 10-12 hrs. It is super sturdy, and keeps him hydrated and going all day.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Reyner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Growler
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast and great to keep cold beer on the go! Handle is kinda weak. Accidentally broke it but was able to get it back on there.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I took it to cancun and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I took it to cancun and had my water cold like they had mentioned. The only downside I would see is that it's little heavy once it's full but I guess it's also because I bought the big one 64 oz so I will be purchasing a smaller one. I recommend it highly because it does what it's meant for. Really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Santos

customer_reviews.title: You'll ❤it I promise!!!
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be built as well if not better than the Yeti bottle. This Growler bottle is better looking, a better value and just as well built. I❤It!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Growler Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this growler so much. I highly recommend buying one of these growers. Took it everywhere, it always stayed cold with whatever cold drink I put in there. I got cold water to last 4 days!!! Will be buying a new one soon and the tumbler they sell since mine got stolen from my car.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After using for several weeks I really like it. The only reason for 4 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: After using for several weeks I really like it. The only reason for 4 stars is the lid screws on tough sometimes. Keeps water cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the usability of the growler and it'seems worth ...
customer_reviews.text: This growler lives up to the expectations of keeping the contents cold for an extended period of time. I am pleased with the usability of the growler and it'seems worth the price. The gasket on the lid does occasionally get twisted but it'seems very simple to slide back into the lid. The Gonovate sleeve makes the large 64 Oz growler very easy to carry and drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made quality water/beverage container. All steel with absolutely no plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kxchic

customer_reviews.title: Filling your OZ
customer_reviews.text: It's super huge bottle. Love it and been using it everyday at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulla M

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle.. The best I ever had. I left ice water in there in a 95 degree room and it was still ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: This growler is amazing. I usually drink at least one of these ...
customer_reviews.text: This growler is amazing. I usually drink at least one of these a day if not 2! I love that I can take my day's worth of water with me anywhere! Fantastic product! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: reminiscing.

customer_reviews.title: Florida Tested & Approved
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my beer cold for hours, even in the Florida heat. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have two of them but suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have two of them but suggest that they include a spare silicone ring with each growler.
customer_reviews.author: nled

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Keeps iced beverages cold just as stated. Needs a strap to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ecpected
customer_reviews.text: Not had a chance to use it yet, but it looks great. I'm certain it will be what I expect. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: When you drink a lot of water and want to control the temperature of your water, this is an ideal bottle. Keeps my warm water warm for hours. Keeps hot or cold water at desired temperature into the next day. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle M. Gravance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it during summer yet but it does keep water cold.
customer_reviews.author: Mocl9

customer_reviews.title: Great growler for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the beer cold, easy to pour, and love the handle for carrying. Purchased as a gift for my husband and he was very impressed! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my growler and landed on the opening and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my growler and landed on the opening and now unable to secure lid on container. Products material is poorly made collapses on impact. Should have have paid alittle more for hydro flask
customer_reviews.author: Angel Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great beer growler
customer_reviews.text: Great beer growler. I take this camping and it keeps the beer cold without having to use cooler space. I just pre-chill the growler with ice-water between my house and the brewery and then fill with beer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Wish it came with a straw lid ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Wish it came with a straw lid as well but no big deal. Love how long it keeps cold!
customer_reviews.author: Colby lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: I'm thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: In spite of all the reviews, I couldn't find a substantial increase in retaining cold because all the tests are done on a full bottle. In normal use, no one would guzzle 64 ounces of anything but drink a little at a time. This would drastically make a difference in the max time that the beverage would retain its temperature. In addition, I noticed that rust spots have started to develop on the lid. I sincerely hope that they don't develop inside the growler. I'm thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Rover

product_meta.title: Smoky Mountain Growlers Stainless Steel Water Bottle Growler All In One 64 ounce (Black)
product_meta.description: Stainless Steel Water Bottle Growler All-In-One. Simply put, this bottle allows you to transport of your choice beverage with degrading the temperature or flavor for extreme amounts of time. We only use high quality food grade 18/8 stainless steel to protect the contents and flavor. Our double wall insulated jug will keep your contents cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12 hours. Cold up to 3 Days when primed. Lifetime Warranty
feature_bullets: High Quality Food Grade 18/8 Stainless Steel
Cold up to 24 hours / Hot up to 12 hours - Cold up to 3 DAYS primed
